product.name: dpHarris – dermobella Hair
product.description: dpHarris, professional hair and scalp analyzer with 50x magnification. The supreme hair analyzer provides comprehensive diagnostic analysis for scalp condition, hair density, dead skin cells on scalp, scalp sensitivity and hair thickness.

product.name: dpiHarris – dermopico Hair
product.description: dpiHarris, design with portability in mind. Features multiple hair and scalp parameters that are vital in finding out the current condition of your hair and scalp. Comes with 30x magnification.

product.name: dpiViso – dermopico Skin
product.description: dpiViso, is designed with portability and accuracy in mind, the  minimal concept design of dermoPico allows you to bring it anywhere you go, making it the ideal partner for your business needs. Comes with 10x magnification.

product.name: dpViso – dermobella Skin
product.description: dpViso, is a professional skin diagnostic system with unparalleled technology that comes with 20x magnification. The dpViso combines stylish and sophisticated design for fast and easy use with a cloud-enabled database of skin images using multi-spectral imaging and proprietary image processing software.
